events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match what I ordered.
The system has detected keywords related to refund and assigned this case to the Refund cluster for handling.
The case has been routed to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund requests and customer reimbursements.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request. Can you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received?
To proceed with your refund, I need your order number and a clear photo of the incorrect product that was delivered.
Thanks for the quick response. My order number is 887654321, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong item I received instead of the camera I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. I’ll also arrange for the wrong item to be picked up at your convenience.
I appreciate the quick help and the refund offer. The pickup option for the wrong item works well for me. Thank you for resolving this efficiently.
The refund has been processed successfully and a pickup for the returned item will occur tomorrow. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that the return pickup was convenient. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
As we haven't heard back, we're closing this support case but feel free to contact us anytime if you have more questions or issues.
